# Creator Mode - Mindful Social Media

Take control of your social media experience. Creator Mode helps you stay focused and intentional by adding a moment of pause before consuming content.

## ðŸ§  Stay Mindful
Instead of endless scrolling, Creator Mode adds a simple "Are you sure?" prompt before showing social media content. Post and create freely while maintaining control over what you consume.

## ðŸ’ª Features
- Unobtrusive overlay that lets you choose when to view content
- Keep posting and creating while blocking the feed
- Zero data collection - works entirely in your browser
- Lightweight and fast
- Simple one-click toggle

## ðŸŽ¨ Perfect For
- Content creators who want to post without getting distracted
- Anyone looking to break the endless scroll habit

Break free from mindless consumption while staying connected. Install Creator Mode today and take back control of your social media experience.
